title: just played an aram and i was the only human
body: as tittle reads, this is obviously a huge problem if i was to take i guess id say that half the accounts that are continuously being made are bots and there probably making decent money out of it, botting in aram to get to lvl 30 then selling as smurfs, i don't really see a future fix for this unless they make an option for making a new acc a lvl 30 instead of leveling it up.

replies.body: "bots get banned in waves". You'll only ever see instant punishments unless the person being reported has triggered the bot by using words! WORDS THAT HURT PEOPLE! OH DEAR GOD!

> i don't really see a future fix for this unless they make an option for making a new acc a lvl 30 instead of leveling it up.

That would most likely only make the situation worse. As it is, the bulk of bot accounts are just being levelled to 30, then sold, while only a small portion are grinding for BE (since that usually occurs *after* the account has reached level 30 and is viable for sale). If you were to take out the necessary levelling, then *all* bot accounts would be grinding out BE (since they'd all start at level 30 with none, or near enough) *and* exist *only* in level 30+ games, as opposed to being rather predominant in pre-30 games.

I'd honestly prefer if Riot did what Garena does and limits every individual to only one account, requiring ID to actually make an account (but then, there's obviously certain issues with that in most regions with a LoL server).
